class_notes: This section is for DABSN semester 1 students only.
course_description: Students learn fundamental principles of nursing science. Students are introduced to the nursing process, evidence-based practice, communication, influences of social determinants of health on well-being, clinical reasoning, health promotion/disease prevention, informatics and patient- and family-centered care.
sections: Class Nbr: 5777, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Haynes Ferere/Coombe, Status: Open
